msgImportConfig: This operation is "append" and will not overwrite your existing rules. Please feel free to operate. If you want to overwrite, please clear it first.
msgNotFound: Please add a new rule, or import an existing configuration file (in JSON format), otherwise this extension will not do anything.
msgCssSelector: The <boldSelectorField/> field uses the <mdnCssSelectorLink/> syntax to specify the element to be tagged on the page.
msgDoNotModify: If you are not familiar with the CSS selector syntax, please do not modify this field, as this may invalidate the extension.
msgDeleteRule: This deletion cannot be undone, are you sure?
settingsLanguageDesc: This setting only affects the display language of Popup and Options pages. The rest of the text will only take effect after changing the browser language.
errorPageGoBack: Go back to the Home Page
errorPageTip: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.
settingsDisableWarningDesc: No longer show "Page is too large" warnings on web pages.
settingsColoringKanjiDesc: The kanji on the page will be colored along with the furigana.
settingsExclusionList: The following sites never add furigana
settingsExclusionListDesc: This setting takes precedence over custom rules (edited via the Rule editor).
messageEmptyList: The list is empty, please add it first.
resetWarning: Are you sure you want to reset the rule list to its initial state?
msgDeleteKanjiFilterDesc: You are deleting the kanji filter corresponding to "{{kanji}}".
quickCreateModalDesc1: Please separate them with spaces or line breaks. Enter a large number of kanji words and the corresponding kanji filter will be auto created for you.
quickCreateModalDesc2: Non-pure kanji words will be filtered. If the input kanji already has yomikatas recorded in the system, the corresponding yomikatas will be cleared and replaced with the "Match ALL" mode.
clearConfigDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to clear the rule list?
createKanjiFilterDialogDesc1: Please use the web search tool in your browser to search for a specific kanji or yomikata, then click the button to start editing. Also, the yomikata must be in katakana format, romaji or hiragana are not accepted.
createKanjiFilterDialogDesc2: The "Match ALL" toggle cannot coexist with the yomokatas field. If you switch to this mode, the original yomokatas field will be cleared and cannot be retrieved.
validationNonRepetitiveKanji: This kanji is already in use.
fieldDomainDesc1: Please click the browser address bar to confirm that the "<boldWwwDot/>" prefix is hidden. If it is, you must enter it as well, otherwise this feature will not work properly.
fieldDomainDesc2: The "<boldHttpsPrefix/>" prefix will be automatically removed.
fieldDomainDesc3: Supports wildcard patterns — e.g. <boldExampleGlobExpr/> (does not match example.com).
importFailedTip: Import failed due to the presence of the following text.
validationNonRepetitiveDomain: This domain is already in use.
clearDomainDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to clear all domains?
settingsAlwaysRunList: The following sites always run in Auto Mode
settingsAlwaysRunListDesc: These sites will not display the "Page is too large" warning. This setting has lower priority than the "never add" list.
